name: Dungeon Keys
description:
Dungeon Keys is a dungeon crawler game where the goal is to find and open the door in the heart of the Dungeon. You can freely explore and look for loot, but you can keep it only if you get out in time, because the longer you stay in there, the louder your heartbeat will become and it will be easier for the guardians of the Dungeon to hunt you down.

Mainly inspired by 'The Legend of Zelda' and 'Decked Out', built by a single persone over the course of a few months.

Key features:

- Heartbeat sound

- Randomly generated map at every run

- Free exploration

- Top-down based combat

Development:

Dungeon Keys is still in its early stage of development and will become a full game if enough interest is shown for it.

I'll be documenting its creation for as long as I'm working on it on my youtube:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCs27QgnPZheyOa-lCF75d8w
